Name: moisture surge 100h auto-replenishing hydrator moisturizer

I have  gone a second day without reapplying it and my face still feels soft and not dry one bit. I will continue to use this once the jar i received runs out. * I wanted to try the Clinique moisturizing mini before I buy a larger size. I would try to start of doing the 30 day reset, if you are using other brands with ingredients like alcohol or silicone, I don't know that you will have the same experience. Name: ultra facial cream with squalane
comments: * don't be fooled. I thought this would be a nice simple, fragrance-free moisturizer for my acne prone combination skin. after 2 weeks of use I experienced whiteheads, oiliness, dryness/itchiness/irritation, texture EVERYWHERE and deep, cystic pimples that hurt to the touch. it hasn't been as bad since, but it took me 6 months and lots of adapelene to clear the acne and scars. I looked it up & my suspicions were confirmed- this ranks highly for comedogenic ingredients!! be careful and pls spare yourself if you have acne prone skin. im sure its a great moisturizer for other skin types. * I picked this as my birthday gift and was glad I did. * I have been having problems with dry skin and this makes my skin so moisturized and glowy i highly recommend this product * This moisturizer broke my face out after 2 uses and took over 1 week to fully resolve. It basically caused tiny skin colored bumps all over my face. If you have senstive skin I wouldnt recommened! * Very light weight and feels so good on my skin. I have extremely dry skin and psoriasis and it has helped tremendously with my dry patches. * I hope this is never changed or discontinued. I've been struggling with skin issues that came out of nowhere. Acne, dryness, irritation, texture. I read online a lot of people with redness and rosacea said this worked for them, so I tried it, not with high hopes. I've tried nearly EVERYTHING. I can't even list all the moisturizers I've tried. They all irritate my skin and make me breakout or turn red or burn and sting. This stuff doesn't at all! Not only that, it's THE MOST MOISTURIZING PRODUCT I HAVE EVER USED, hands down! On top of that, after a couple weeks, it's completely changed my skin. My skin looks literally like glass! It's SO SMOOTH, the texture is GONE, my pores are small and smooth, I have a glow that I've never had in my life and I'm 35! my skin is SO SOFT and supple. I will NEVER LET THIS STUFF GO. If they see this, please DONT CHANGE IT! I've tried them all from every brand and this is MILES BEYOND the rest. If you're considering trying it, try it! They do offer a small trial size (at least as of now). Not everything works for everyone, but try it! * It is really good, i got pne for my ulta b-day present and i do not regret picking it at all and i have nevere used something better that this. I will definitely be buying this next time!

Name: toleriane double repair face moisturizer uv spf 30

I don't doubt about the goodness of the ingredients, is a good formula and you will see how nice your skin gets , but in my case.. is about plump thing. * I wasn't one to use moisturizers consistently but my skin was getting dry patches so picked this one up at a discount on one of the deal days.  So glad I discovered it.  My skin soaks it up immediately so it's not greasy feeling at all.  My skin seems softer and more even after using it.  I just bought my second jar. * I have very sensitive skin and hesitate to change up on products, but I kept running out if my former moisturizer quickly. I found this in-store and decided to give it a try. My skin yearns for moisture but I didn't want a moisturizer that is heavy. I was using a lighter moisturizer for day and using a heavier cream at night. This does an excellent job of moisturizing both day and night. The moisture hangs on all day. My make-up glides on easily in the morning. I can now use one product instead of two, but I am considering trying the night cream. I have been using this for two weeks and I can see a difference in how my skin presents. It looks healthier. The lines arent as noticeable and the skin is more hydrated. I will keep using this product.

Name: 24-7 moisture hydrating day & night cream
natural moisturizing factors + ha daily moisturizer
comments: * This is my favorite moisturizer i have repurchased this so many time. Great for dry skin * For a while I had small little bumps on my cheeks and forehead before I started using this moisturizer. Once I switched to this after hearing about it those bumps VANISHED! My skin loves this stuff and its affordable. Its on the thick side so a little bit goes a long way :) . * I have combination skin, and my t zone hasn't quit since middle school! This is a light, non-comedogenic moisturizer that is especially nice for when my skin is a little irritated. There's no bells and whistles; and it won't be moistuizing enough for very dry skin. Unfortunately, heavy moisturizers cause breakouts; in fact, I can't tolerate TO's rich moisturizer. When used with targeted toners, serums, and retinoids, I find it adequate and soothing. Light enough to use before a sunscreen, too. * I love this moisturizer! I feel like the bottle has lasted me forever, even with me using it 2x a day for almost six months. It soaks into the skin well, doesn't clog my pores, and is a great starting point for flawless makeup. It is a little heavy at first on the skin but always soaks in well. I do have to use an SPF on top of this so thats really my only Con! * Ive been using it for years now and its the only one ill use moving forward. Mixes great with other products and has helped with dry undereyes. * I love this product so much and has helped my acne tremendously * I started using this a few years ago when it came out, is one of the only face lotions I can use that will not spark an eczema flair, yes menopause changed my skin, and this works well.  My young adult kids use it as well and no problems. They have tried many other ones. Dermatologists do recommend this as well since there is not a lot in the formulation than can cause break outs. I am allergic to fragrance (in the skincare realm that could be anything, you don't know till your face tells you). The price point is good.

Name: dynamic skin recovery spf 50 moisturizer
comments: * This goes on very light, and smells great. Does not pill with foundation on top. It is a good moisturizer, but won't feel greasy for the rest of the day. No sunburns yet! * It isn't too greasy but doesn't sit well under makeup and made me breakout, even when using without makeup. * I have been using this product daily for years. Every time I begin to debate repurchasing (due to the price point), I get mistaken for being 24 even though I'm 30. I always end up back at Ulta getting another bottle. It's very moisturizing for how thin it applies to my face. I never feel greasy or like my skin can't breathe. I swear by this product... worth the money! * I really like how this moisturizer makes my skin feel. Great to have high SPF the without it feeling heavy or sticky! No breakouts or irritation. It works well with the Dermalogica Intensive Moisture Cleanser and Daily Milkfoliant. I'm very happy with this product. * I wish I could hate this because of the price but this is a great product. My skin is extremely sensitive and most facial sun screens make my face burn when I am in the sun, this one does not. It works great, goes on easy and doesn't bother my face. * This moisturizer is truly great! I love that it saves me an extra step in my skincare routine with the SPF 50. I feel genuinely protected from the sun wearing it. I am someone with combination skin, dry, normal and oily areas, especially near my T zone and chin. I love how lightweight this feels on my skin compared to other SPF products, which feel overly thick and greasy. This moisturizer is very light and absorbs quickly, leaving a dewy look on the skin. The only things i dislike about this product are the smell. To me, it smells bad. It has a slight sunscreen smell, but theres another scent to it i cant quite place that im not a fan of. That, and i have to use several pumps to get it to cover my face and neck, so it seems like i have to use quite a bit of product at any given time. This wouldnt be an issue if the cost wasnt so high! I wish these products were more affordable because theyre amazing for sensitive skin. All in all, its a great product, and i will continue to use. I will definitelt be waiting for a sale before i buy again though. * I have been using this moisturizer for 8 years! I love it! Like really love it. I am pretty loyal to dermalogica. This moisturizer is my go to everyday without miss. My skin is normal to oily in the t zone. I have never had a break out.

Age: 26 * Leaves my face soft and radiant.  Not greasy or sticky * This moisturizer is just what my skin needed! I had a bad reaction to a retinol cream so I decided to try to this product and it has changed my skin within only a couple of days! My dryness is gone and my skin looks more even. My face feels very hydrated after use and I have honestly seen a lot of improvement on lines around my neck! The product does feel a little thick applying, almost like a layer on top of your face if you use too much but that is my only complaint! * Upgraded my skin care products and chose the perfect brand! This product only takes a very small amount and takes care of the face and neck. My only issue is it doesnt absorb quickly so I have to really rub it in. But after 1 day of morning and night use my skin is not red and patchy looking anymore. Very gentle on the skin and leaves my face feeling firm and tight! * This stuff is fantastic!! I am pretty picky about my skincare products. I just bought my 3rd jar. It doesnt take much. The 1.7oz jar lasts two months, using it on face & neck. It almost comes to feel like a serum when it's being applied. 
Im coming up on being 50yrs-old this year, & this product is one of my Top 3 Favorite Moisturizers. I have dry skin & this moisturizer by itself makes my skin feel hydrated. 
It legitimately firms your face and neck, both. A few minutes after applying, you can pat/tap on your face & feel the results - skin that bounces back. Hexapeptide 8 (aka Argireline) is a great firming compound & it's listed toward the top. 
I use this day & night, & add over it a slightly heavier moisturizer for overnight. 

Try it!!

Name: cicalfate+ restorative protective cream

Name: countercontrol matte effect gel cream
comments:
* If you truly have oily skin, you know the difference in a review from someone with oily skin vs someone whos skin gets oily.  I have oily skin and probably spend upwards of $1K a year on products trying to find things that actually do as they claim, and this is one of them.

I was a little reluctant to purchase this as the price is pretty high for a brand I've never used, but I'm glad that I took the risk on it.  Prior to this moisturizer I was either using none at all (because most others just make me more oily, dont need redundant products on oily skin), or I was using the La-Roche Posay Toleriane Double Repair Matte one which didn't do much for me. Obviously how this will work for you is going to be different for everyone, and the other products you use prior to your moisturizer will make a difference as well.

For reference I am a 28 yr old female, white/Caucasian.  My morning routine is: wash with a clay based cleanser (Dermalogica), tone (Fenty Skin), hyperpigmentation serum (Good Molecules), niacinamide/zinc serum (Sunday Riley), then this moisturizer. The consistency of this product is great for oil as it is a gel based product, but it comes out more opaque white than clear which is fine. It does not have much of a fragrance that I have noticed, but I'm not sensitive to fragrance so I wouldn't be one to say. When I put this on it almost feels as if it is a crossover between a moisturizer and a makeup primer that blurs your pores.  Now it does not make your pores go away by any means, but it does HELP.  Immediately after applying my skin is definitely mattified but again, not completely shine free as if it is a primer with the sole purpose of making your skin look like it has powder on it. It does not make my skin feel tight and dried out, it genuinely makes me feel moisturized and smooth without the glowy look that normal moisturizers do. From my experience it definitely does not keep me matte for 8 hours, I would say after about 3-4 hours I start to see shine on my face to the point where I feel the need to blot if I were going out somewhere (this is all without wearing makeup or anything on top of my morning skin routine, I work from home).

If you truly have an oily/combo skin type this is not going to be your holy-grail product that makes all of your problems disappear (will continue to search for it), but if it is within your budget for a product of this type then this is 100% top 5 best moisturizers for oily skin on the market right now in my opinion after having used this for a few weeks now.  Would repurchase (and I rarely ever find products I do)!  

I also just want to throw out there that I did buy this on my own, was not asked/paid to write this, and I think this is either my only review I've ever written on Ulta or one of a few over a span of years that I don't even remember. * The packaging is very luxe but the pump feels like its empty and its still half full. Name: water drench hyaluronic cloud cream hydrating moisturizer

comments: * This is a really great SPF moisturizer. It really holds up to its name. I've been looking at this brand for months and finally got it. Highly recommend! * It is weightless but it burns yours eyes terribly when you go to take it off ...and it's not sweat proof...for the almost $50 this is I expect more out of a spf moisturizer. And the bonus, it's less expensive! * Normally I check the ingredients of a product before I buy it because I just cannot take any risks with products containing pore clogging ingredients. My skin is really sensitive to certain ingredients. Unfortuanly, I didnt check this product's ingredient list before I bought it because I was so desperate to find a hydrating moisturizer. I used it a total of 3 times and my skin barrier was DESTROYED. I checked the ingredient list and of course it has shea butter in it. Shea butter is the absolute worst thing to put on sensitive, acne prone skin with a 5/5 rating on the comeogenic scale. I put the entire ingredient list of this product into my reliable pore clogging ingredient checker and come to find out, IT HAS 7 DIFFERENT INGREDIENTS THAT CLOG PORES: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Palmitic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Myristic Acid and Stearic Acid. * I love this product but I dont like that I cant tell how much is left. comments: * I was excited to try this moisturizer as I've heard so many great things about it but upon using it for a month I am very disappointed. Since the formula change, this has given me nothing but problems.

comments:
* This is my first time trying these products. I was looking for a sunscreen that would not burn my sensitive skin or my eyes. 

I am 27 with combination skin. This product Is not greasy at all and it lasts all day. I also pair it with the mist for a retouch. * Has a cool and soft touch to the face. I also love the packaging. * This product made my face break out * I have very dry skin to the point it hurts sometimes, and I'm very particular about always wearing sunscreen on my face; I love this moisturizer/sunscreen! It really hydrates my skin, protects from the sun, and doesnt make me breakout either! I really enjoy the way it dispenses because it helps me to not use too much/too little of the product. * I have very dry skin and this stuff works its magic! Worth the price in my opinion. One jar lasted me a couple of months using it daily * i loveeeee this spf! it feels like a hydrating moisturizer but with 50 spf! which is amazing! it has an easy to use push down pump which i like. its a must have and a definite re-purchase for when i run out! run and get this! * I got this product on sale, which is why I bought it. The regular price tag is a bit hefty. I really like it; I have dry skin that gets greasy the moment it doesn't get enough moisture, and very acne prone. Many products break me out immediately. While I don't think this product does anything favorable in terms of acne when it's already there, I at least think that it doesn't break me out. It gives the skin a really nice look on its own, and as long as it dries first it looks nice under my other makeup. I prefer a dewier, glossier skin, so it might not work for everyone. My skin is definitely healthier since I started using it each morning. I will probably bite the bullet and rebuy despite the price tag.

Name: retinol correxion max daily hydration creme
comments: * I've been a fan of Roc products for over ten years, but not this one. I'm halfway through my second jar in a row, and am noticing less smoothing and plumping of my skin than I had before. It moisturizes just fine, but nothing else. * Went to see my Derm and was told my skin looked really good. I took a photo of this Roc product and told her the price. She was shocked yhat it was working so well. Me I'm very happy that it is affordable and works❣️ * It's love from fist use. I can tell that my face has more clarity. After a week I noticed my fine lines are softer even my frown lines became less noticeable. I'm very happy with Roc. I spent hundreds of dollars on more expensive products and noticed nothing of skin improvement, but the result this cream gave me is amazing. I can't wait to buy the eye cream from this version. I believe the retinol in this product has nailed it . It meets with the secrets of skin care beauty. Thank u Roc and thank u Ulta for selling the best for ur customers. * I am 75 yrs old and have never seen any cream work as well as this. I am blown away by it and the difference it has made in my complexion.  I have very few wrinkles for my age and this has done a great job  with perfecting my complexion. * I am a mature woman, and have dry skin, with some dark spots.  This product is amazing!  In one week, my spots began to fade.  Looking at my skin, I notice a fresh dewy look!  Compared to many other products, this is an affordable option, which really works! * My first ever review on Ulta. Buy this! I ran out of an expensive retinol serum, and wanted something more $ friendly and a retinol and moisturizer in one. I've been using for 2 weeks now, and my skin looks extremely healthy. I am also pairing with a vitamin c serum. Now, I know the potency is legit because I dumbly went to use the infrared sauna after I used this. Needless to say I have myself a little irritation and redness because of how potent this was. It goes well under makeup, I don't even need a primer I just use setting spray throughout my routine, and the moisturizer isn't overwhelming. This is my new go to moisturizer. * After reading a bunch of reviews, trying several expensive and inexpensive options, this has finally been the best moisturizer for my chronically dry 46 year old skin. My skin finally feels hydrated all day, no more crepe paper forehead, cheeks feel soft.

Name: rescue balm +red correct post-blemish recovery cream
comments:
* i took before and after photos and wow, the redness is virtually gone. didn't even realize how red my face was before. i could definitely use this as a no makeup base. * As I've gotten to my mid 30s I'm fortunate enough to start getting fine lines while still having acne. I started retinol with my dermatologist but really wanted an alternative to full coverage foundations like mac studiofix and estee lauder double wear, as my skin is happier without heavy makeup. I tried this after seeing my hairdresser use it and it's amazing!! it balances out the pink from my undertones and blends the red from acne breakouts and irritation without there being a noticeable mark. At first I didn't like this product as much because I tend to be heavy handed and applied it like a foundation but when you apply it like a lotion (lightly) it blends in easier and doesn't come off orange around the hairline. * Love it!… I hate to wear foundation. I use this to correct some redness on my chin, works wonders. Ive gotten so many compliments about how smooth my skin looks! * Unfortunately, this product delivered zip, zilch, zero for me.  It did not read orange on me, but also provided minimal if any redness coverage for me.  I tried varying different amounts of product, methods of application-no dice.  I don't write negative reviews based on breakouts bc I feel that is so much based on individual sensitivities, but this also did result in a breakout on my cheeks within a few days of trying it out. * i have very pale skin and redness from acne scars and rosacea. i LOVE this product. it evens my skin tone so well i sometimes dont even need concealer or foundation. i also like that it helps with my acne if im having a break out. i use this everyday * I have significant redness on both cheeks and this product is a blessing!  I have decent skin otherwise so I can easily use this on the cheeks and not have to wear foundation.  I put it on after my moisturizer routine. * I started getting really bad rosacea in my later 20s. I was never big into makeup and skin care - my sister gave me a few things to try and i samples some things store employees recommended but everything just made it look worse but making it still red but now looked like i was obviously trying to cover it up in a gross way. 

In my 30s i decided to do something about it and jumped into the wonderful world of skincare and in tandem - makeup. While trying to tame the flair ups, i tried to find something to cover it up - foundation, skin tints, concealer - all the products marketed to solve my problem didnt. They all made it look worse still…until I found this product from Hero. I found a tiny travel size and thought what can it hurt, ive tried everything else. I honestly couldnt believe it when i put it on after my morning skin care. I cried i was so happy - dramatic, sure, but true…if you have rosecea flair up that have taken over your reality then you might get it. 

This magical elixir tamed the redness in my face while also looking like my skin and didn't make it feel like i had tons of make up on.  this product literally gave me back my confidence while i work diligently to get my skin barrier as healed as possible while living wirh rosacea. 

I also can use it as a primer and then top it with one of the good skin tint products ive found over time for more coverage, but even when just running to the store i throw this on quickly and poof, im no longer so self conscious of my bring red, splotchy face and i feel like a human again.  

Besides the expensive Erborian version, which is pretty solid, but heavily scented and I cant afford, this one doesnt turn me orange like other renditions of this product that are in a similar price point. 

Only issue: i wish it came in bigger bottles

Name: full fit propolis light cream
comments: * I absolutely love this moisturizer! It's light & feels very hydrating. I love the dewy finish on my skin, but I wouldn't recommend for oily girls. This has Propolis at the very top of the ingredient list, so you know you're getting all the benefits for an affordable price. Not to mention it's fragrance free! I pair this with a peptide eye cream & it has diminished my fine lines * In lieu of my 5 star rating, this product sadly ended up in my "can't use" category. I absolutely loved EVERYTHING about the whole Propolis line, but unforturnately Propolis is an allergen tested during an allergy patch test and mine showed a trace reaction which my allergist informed me to avoid any allergens even if it is only a trace. This could be an issue for people who have sensitive skin. I have to say that other than being a possible irritant or allergy to some, this moisturizer is a really great consistency and lives up to all the expectations that it claims to have. As with any product that is new to your skin, proceed with caution and do a patch test. Its worth knowing :) * I love the toner and serum in this line but for whatever reason this lotion is just waaay too much for me. It would irritate my exzema and cause small/minor breakouts. I have dry/reactive/acne prone skin so moisturizers are a challenge for me * My skin loves it! My pores look smooth, its calming & hydrating without looking greasy. A little goes a long way. * I LOVE THIS! My skin took around a week to really settle into this as my face reacts to new things. However once i got into the routine of using this, my pores look smooth, my skin is plump, and is overall hydrating without looking greasy. It also calms down the redness I have on my cheeks. A little goes a long way. I finally found a moisturizer that works for me. * I was hesitant to try this however, it makes my skin feel great.  I use this with a few of the same line and I believe my skin looks and feels tighter and more moisturized! * Decided to switch up my moisturizer just out of curiosity. This one was definitely on the pricier side from what I'm used to, but it's totally worth it! I used to advocate for the Cerave one, but after trying this one, I don't know if I'll ever go back. It's super hydrating and my skin still looks glowy and healthy after a full face of matte makeup. I definitely noticed a difference after adding this cream to my skin care routine. My skin looks so much smoother and healthier than it ever has before.

Name: moisture whipped ceramide cream
comments: * I love the product but I hate that the writing rubs off the jar after a while. I notice there's pieces of the blue label gets on my fingers and on my face. * I have combo skin (dry psoriasis around my hairline and neck, and oily t zone) I got this moisturizer in an IPSY glam bag and immediately loved it and came to Ulta to grab one. it's very simple and doesn't irritate my skin! * I bought this moisturizer on a whim and I am OBSESSED. My skin barrier was wrecked, and I was having a major rosacea flare up. Literally nothing was helping, until I tried this. It's a thick moisturizer, but it feels extremely light weight once rubbed in. It gives the most beautiful glow. There is absolutely no scent to this and I live that. My only concern is how small the jar is. I wish it was bigger because this stuff is amazing. 100% recommend. * It was recommended by one of the store associates and it is the bump👍🏾👍🏾👍🏾 I like the creamy and thickness that dissolved in the skin leaving your face moisture. * I got this product recommended by one of the Ulta workers and absolutely loving it! It's not as greasy on me and also use it as a primer ! My base looked pretty smooth when using this as a primer. Love it. * I got a free trial size packet of this product to try. I was really surprised by its thickness and creaminess! It has a light pleasant smell and feels very luxurious on the face. It takes a bit to absorb fully but it feels SO hydrating. Definitely will be buying the full size. * I got a sample of it and I love it, I have Rosacia and this has not caused any breakouts or reactions and my skin feels so soft... I want to buy a big jar if it when my sample runs out but still deciding it's pretty pricey

Name: hyper real skincanvas balm moisturizing cream
comments: * the product is great! the packaging is horrible. the lid crumbles and cracks and white flakes end up all over my hand and inside the lotion and then all over my face. * you need this in your collection! * MAC liquid makeup is great.  I immediately felt the difference in the application. * Makes my skin appear hydrated and more even toned. No makeup needed! * Ive used this on myself and on my clients & it pilled. ive tried using a heavy layer and a light layer and it still pills & flakes. * This is the BEST creation from MAC for a flawless finish when you apply your makeup! It's a must-have for me along with the serumizer 💕 * Amazing! Very hydrating.

Name: ginzing energizing gel cream with caffeine + niacinamide
comments: * I was looking for cheaper dupe to the 100hr moisture surge from clinique and this was the only other moisturizer that has caffine in it. But the smell was too strong. Says theres essential oil inside but i never break out but i did. Go pay the extra 10 or get moisturizer surge. Also blackfriday and other holidays it goes on sale * I received a sample of this product in a big sample kit and decided to try it out. I had been using The Ordinary Niacinamide + Zinc for the longest time and after trying out the sample there is no going back for me. I had no idea but The Ordinary was causing breakouts which cleared up in a matter of days once switching to this. It makes my skin feel refreshed almost immediately and my skin looks brighter and plumper after just 30 minutes. Normally heavily fragrant products make me break out and cause my face to burn due to my sensitive skin but I have not had this issue at all with this product. It is a refreshing citrus smell which I absolutely LOVE the smell of citrus. After long time use my skin consistently looked brighter and I had less dry skin and fine lines. It is true that it does leave your skin feeling sticky but I always put my moisturizer on top of it and the stickiness is no longer an issue. I highly recommend this product!! * This moisturizer has really leveled up the radiance of my face. I use this as my night cream, and ive been waking up to increasibgly refreshed and energetic skin with each passing day. * My skin has never felt so soft. I also use the scrub so the combination is making my skin look younger and softer! * I have been using this product for years and it was great, but now, the formula changed and caused my face to break out. Will not be repurchasing. * Best light moisturizer for combination skin.  I've used it for a long time and love it. * I love the glow this gives but it isn't worth it due to the horrible pilling. No matter what I do, it rubs off in flakes and looks disgusting. I wish they would fix that because it is otherwise a good moisturizer.

Name: rescue party barrier comfort cream
comments: * My skin was running very dry in recent years, and someone gifted me a very potent retinol product recently that wrecked my skin. It was so bad that even applying moisturizer made my skin burn. I was DESPERATE. I couldnt really afford going to an esthetician regularly so I did some research and found this line which sounded like exactly what I needed without costing $100+ per product. I was hopeful but I did not expect THIS. My skin redness went down significantly, the itchiness, the burning, all started to go away. My skin feels supple, plump, and even moisturized! I feel like I was always looking for my perfect fit and I think I finally found it! I'm OBSESSED! Thank you Peach & Lily!!! * Firstly, I love Peach and Lily. I see immediate results with their products and am absolutely thrilled with this one in particular. I tend to use this as my night creme, as I do my 'more aggressive' treatments then. It feels luxurious, and I don't mind the nautral scent at all. It is not as 'clean' smelling as the Matcha Pudding, but it definitely moisturizes and calms more intensely than it's counterpart. Absolutely recommend this if you have sensitive skin or have used to many exfoliates or actives. I also think it is great for preventative care. Will absolutely repurchase over, and over again. * This product line (Rescue Party) from Peach & Lily has absolutely SAVED my skin. After experiencing some hormonal changes that les to dry, flaky, and inflammed skin for the first time in my life, I knee i had to try something drastic. I have used Beekman and First Aid Beauty in the past, similar pricepoints, but neither had results like this. I will absolutely re-purchase. * LISTEN. Everyone needs this cream and the serum in their routine. For me, they stop and prevent outbreaks. My skin looks great! HIGHLY recommend. * I struggle with autoimmune issues that cause periodic issues with dry/flakey skin, break outs and redness. This has helped quickly clear up any flare up I've had since getting it. I also use the repair serum with it and have loved the results. I'm not a big fan of fragrance products with how sensitive my skin is, but I do wish there was something to do about the smell. It can be pretty off putting. All in all I'm happy with the product though. * I have combination skin. I love Peach & Lily matcha pudding but it wasn't quite moisturizing enough for the Az climate where I live. I needed something more moisturizing but without the oily effect. This is it. Love this cream. It also helped soothe redness from my rosacea on cheeks and nose. The texture is thicker but buttery which melts really nicely into my skin and doesn't leave me greasy like most moisturizers. Highly recommend. * splurged on this enticing product to heal overly -exfoliated skin. the product feels great on my skin and is indeed comforting, but even after weeks of use and discontinued exfoliating, my skin is still too dry. won't be repurchasing.

Name: atmosphere protection cream
comments:
* I purchased this cream and overnight cream for my face along with the body lotion ..WELL
They all smell the same overnight and Day facial cream is the same to me 
I spent over $100.00 on two facial products are the same .
won't buy it again * Lightweight, smells great and doesn't irritate my sensitive skin. * Ok seriously Ive tried thousands of products over the yeara because i have sensitive ans acne prone skin! Ive been using this every day sometimes twice a day if i rememebr and its kept my skin CLEAR!! Even with the return of rhe mask mandate at work its protected my skin from my "maskne" ive had theoughout the pandemic. Would definetlt recomend this. This trial ive used this alone for about a month and a half. * I got a free sample of this product. It is NOT fragrance free. I immediately had to wash my face * This is a really good product for my combination skin. Vey matte and leaves no oily residue. However, they need to change the bottle on this product. The last quarter of it will become highly uncomfortable to dispense and you will end up having to fight for the last couple drops in there. * very light moisturizer, stronger smell than expected (almost minty but it's not?), feels great on skin, but the price point is higher than what I think the product experience is worth * I loved this moisturizer. It had a spa-like smell and soothed my red, acne prone skin. Unfortunately, they changed the formula recently and it now includes niacinamide which I am allergic to. I'm so bummed! I don't understand why Osea didn't just make a whole new product instead of changing this one which was previously amazing!

Name: hydra-essentiel silky moisturizer with double hyaluronic acid
comments:
* I had been use this product over 20 years 
It worked very good on my skin. * This is marketed for normal-dry skin but I have combo-oily and my skin drinks this! Also not marketed for my age range (20s), but if you're looking to splurge, this is it! I bought it on a whim as a Beauty Steal and I would absolutely buy it again. It's super hydrating but lightweight, not greasy, great for sensitive skin, and leaves me with a healthy glow! This moisturizer has helped to smooth my skin especially as I'm dealing with breakouts - gives me better glass skin than some Asian beauty products that claim to do so. Love love love! * A light moisturizer that delivers maximum hydration.  I have always had good results from Clarins products. * This could be a great prduct if they took out the nasty fragrance. It's so bad and lingers on my skin for hours. When I use this one, my cat won't come near me and cowers if I try to oet him. That should tell you how bad the smell of this is. * Buy it. * Never used any face product that is this much perfumed. Thinking about return. * I decided to give this cream a try & wow I love how smooth my skin looks and feels. Highly recommend.

Name: firmx collagen moisturizer
comments: * I blend this with the  prayer Thomas water drench sheet tint moisturizer. Blends great! Firms my skin and doesn't feel greasy or heavy.  I use this as a foundation.  Quite  expensive for the combo… but it works great with make up or just as a tinted moisturizer with mascara. * This is a great product and feels good on my skin, but I can't use it like other moisture products before applying my foundation because of pilling.. I now use only at night so I'm not putting anything over it. * I like it. I also drink collagen supplements so i think it works pretty well on top if it. Im only 23 so i dont have wrinkles to begin with but i will say that its pretty sticky going on and if you touch your face while its trying to dry than you will get the 'beads' like everyone else is saying but if you dont touch your face until its fully dry it will look normal * I was hoping this product was going to be my stop to moisturizer search. my skin is extremely dry. it does leave your skin feeling very soft. I wouldn't say I noticed any noticeable difference besides a shiny forehead. the thing I really don't like about this product is after you rub it in and it drys, if you rub your face it peels up its gross...... I'm sad I wish I could love this product and for over $80 I don't want the product to ball up and peel on my face. * makes you skin feel refreshed, still have wrinkles but maybe a few weeks will diminish them * I am amazed at the results.  I've been using this product for a couple years. * I love it and it helps me a lot

Name: high potency classics: face finishing & firming moisturizer
clinique for men broad spectrum spf 21 moisturizer
comments: * Loooooved this SPF moisturizer, it worked perfectly on my face and did a great job protecting my skin from UV rays all day, but after finding out how potentially harmful oxybenzone can be I stopped using it & switched to a Cetaphil moisturizer instead. Wish they'd reformulate it so I could go back to using it again. * I personally wasn't a fan of this product. First I want to point out the sales associates at Ulta are super sexist to men and I got passed multiple times every time I asked for help literally ignored me. But back to this product, it's very similar to sun screen I prefer a thicker face lotion like the 2-1 face & beard but that got discontinued. * After years of using Vasaline Intensive Care lotion on his face, I convinced him to try the Clinique For Men Broad Spectrum SPF21 Moisturizer.  He loved it!  For a lotion with sun scree, it's not greasy and  it absorbs into the skin nicely leaving no residue. * If you've ever had a reaction to a sunscreen this one probably contains your culprit. Wore once and broke out in a rash/hives where it was applied. I will now be avoiding oxybenzone. * Applied it at the store to test it out and also bought some, a few hours later had a giant bump on my chin. Going to rerun it tomorrow. * This is the only product my husband doesn't seem to have a skin reaction to. He has oily, sensitive skin. * My husband, who usually hates skin care products, is obsessed with this Clinique moisturizer. I paired this one with the anti-age moisturizer in the Clinique line and he's noticed a huge difference in his skin tone.

Name: travel size lipikar ap+m triple repair body moisturizer for dry skin
comments:
* I have very dry skin and this product makes my skin shine, never had that before and it is awesome! I love it so much. I have repurchased twice now and will never try another moisturizer * Literally my holy grail moisturizer. I've gone through 3 big bottles! So hydrating and sits well under makeup. Love 🫶🏼 * good product great price * Has such a horrible smell for an unscented lotion. Can't even tell you how it is bc the smell is so bad I have to wash it off every time. Threw it out! * Thick but not tacky. Dries down well. Applies well to face and body. Perfect for dry climate winter and summer. We buy this oveer and oveeerrr. * Oh my GOODNESS! I have suffered from very dry, cystic, Acne prone skin and along with that, i get breakouts of cystic acne along with eczema breakouts on top of it. This moisturizers says its good for the body as well, and it is, but its the only thick mositurizer that really has helped heal my skin. I used to use $60 moisturizers that did help, but only had very little product and were EXPENSIVE. This moisturizer has done the same affects to my skin and has like 4 times more the product and is more than half the price! DEF GET IT! And a little goes a LONG way! * This lotion was supposed to help soothe dry, painful skin. I can only use it right after showering. Otherwise, if I put it on super dry skin it itches and I have to wash it off. I tried putting it on a painful rash, but I started yelling because doing that made the pain SO much worse. Would never buy again for that reason alone, but also because this brand is NOT CLEAN, CRUELTY-FREE, VEGAN. 

Also, I was told when purchased that the brand is sustainable and cruelty-free and does not test on animals. NOT TRUE AT ALL. I was not in the best headspace since my skin was screaming due to a rash when I was shopping, but I specifically said that I do not use anything that isn't vegan and cruelty-free. I stressed that in my conversations with the beauty advisor who helped me. 

La Roche-Posay is owned by L'Oreal, which is well known for testing on animals. They sell in mainland China, where it is required by law to test products on animals to sell there. They are NOT certified clean or cruelty-free because of this. I'm really mad that I let that slip through and upset that Ulta never did due diligence on which brands are, in fact, clean beauty. Do your research before shopping for clean beauty here or go somewhere else, where they actually check things like this.

Name: bha clarify gel cream
comments: * I love how it feels on my skin and i think it would add hydration to my skin. * My daughter tried the face wash and this gel and her face had a terrible reaction. No, no new foods or other items. She immediately began burning. Her face is like this on both sides and she has never had sensitive reaction to any other product. * I have dry, but clear skin. However, summertime + makeup = sweaty breakouts. So to stay on top of it, I started using this product once daily during my nighttime routine. Started working in just a few days of use. Now, instead of having several problem areas after a full day of wearing a full face of  makeup and sweating, I maybe have just small baby blemish that resolves itself overnight. It also does not dry out my skin more than it already is, if anything my skin has been feeling softer and more hydrated. I use La Roche Posay double repair moisturizer and it works well alongside it. With how well this has worked for me, I'm excited to try more products from them. Highly recommend! * i love this brand so much i've literally never been disappointed with any of their stuff but my makeup grips onto this like the hydro grip primer i am in love!! I've always had issues with layering and pilling no matter what i changed before but this product is crazy good and makes it easy, here to repurchase AGAIN. please good molecules never stop making this product and just try it especially if u have oily or combo skin * The product itself and the formula is great, but the packaging is so bad, when I opened the product there was too much pressure on the bottle and it wasted half the bottle of product. This is not the first time this has happened, please fix this * Cleared up my skin sooo fast. My skin is not 100% clear but it took care of my major acne asap and feels so good on my skin. * This is such an inexpensive product for the quality. I wish it came in a bigger size. This is a staple in my skincare roster! I don't use it everyday, but when I notice a pimple or 2 and it helps clear my skin. Highly recommend.

Name: a perfect world spf 40 age-defense moisturizer with white tea
redness relief calming cream
comments: * I want to like this but it's just too sticky. With summer coming the last thing I need is a sticky face. Really bummed * It calmed down my redness a lot I have rosacea. This is the only product that works for me so far as well as the peach slices cleanser combined. * Hydrating moisturizer, however I have sensitive skin and after a few days of using the product my skin started to burn and get really red. * soothing and hydrating * i figured i would try this out because i have a lot of redness on my cheeks. it does help a little bit but for someone who has combination/ oily skin, i wouldn't recommend it. it leaves your skin feeling and looking super oily. i'll be sticking with my usual moisturizer! * I work in a cooler all day and ive noticed over the past year that my skin stays red. Im not sure of its aging or the cold air or alittle but of both but so far ive been enjoying the calming cream. I haven't had any breakouts, I haven't seen a significant difference other then my skin feels hydrated throughout the day. Its only been a week though. * This product is OK. It does help relieve redness. It's easy to use and has a gel-like texture. It doesn't have a weird or bad smell, which is a plus.  HOWEVER! It is greasy feeling on the face.  I have combo skin,  and in my dry areas this is NBD. but in my oily areas it is (to me) quite annoying. I bought this product to calm my irritated skin, as the product I went in to buy was OOS and I needed immediate relief.  I gave this 3 🌟  because this may be great for some. just not me. I'll be ordering my usual product online and passing this on to my teenager

Name: facial moisturizer broad spectrum spf 30
comments: * I am a big fan of the Vanicream Moisturizer and Bar Soap for my sensitive skin, so I decided to give the SPF a shot. Unfortunately, I cannot recommend this specific product from the brand. It has that very strong sunscreen smell & automatically burned my eyes. It is very thick & has a heavy white/blue cast that wont go away no matter how much you rub it in. I gave light skin and noticed the white cast, so I'm sure its way worse for medium-dark skin tones. It is sticky and leaves an oily finish. This isnt a product that can be worn under makeup easily without seperation. If you're looking for a sensitive skin sunscreen that you can slap on your face while at the beach & dont have sensitive eyes, then this might be okay. However, compared to Korean sunscreen I've tried, this one cannot compete. * I am a big fan of the Vanicream Moisturizer and Bar Soap for my sensitive skin, so I decided to give the SPF a shot. I tried it with my normal skin tint on top and powdered lightly but it still shows oily through the makeup and i dont love that. I used it as a body sunscreen and worked great on legs and feet for our beach trip, used it up that way and will not repurchase. I do love the daily moisturizer (without spf) and jt also contains squalane but sinks in better and does not have the greasy finish like this one does. I will for sure repurchase that one probably as a nighttime cream for over serums. * Perfect mineral sunscreen, hydrating, wonderful base. * This all mineral sunscreen is super hydrating. I personally dont get a white cast however my skin is light and i use it as a main sunscreen so i still tend to add tinted sunscreen or foundation with zinc and titanium dioxide on top to give me more of a makeup look when i am doing a more full makeup look. Incredible. Wish it was sold in travel sizes or at least available in mini/travel size during the holidays. * it left a white cast on my face, and did not seem super moisturizing * I love this sunscreen! Great texture. Blends in easily. Leaves a great glow that's not greasy.

Name: hydra zen glow lightweight liquid moisturizer with hyaluronic acid
comments:
* One of the best moisturizers ive used and ive used quite a few. I honestly it better then even the more expensive, better reviewed competitors (like Tatcha or Glow Recipe). The smell is strong but it works really well and makes my skin glow and feel good. * lightweight, not too glowy , easy to layer with sunscreens * I was advised to try this instead of more makeup to cover red areas on my skin. It worked immediately and just zapped my dry skin issues. My friend, who has suffered from Excema for years saw her redness and itchy skin gone within days. * Came back to do a review update because I'm on bottle 3 of this gem right now and I figured most reviews are done after a couple uses or a week of use. I like to read reviews after extensive use of a product. Okay so after bottle #2 I decided to branch out and try something new (I know we all do it!) so after almost 3 mths of using something else my face lacked it's glow and some of my hyperpigmentation returned around my cheeks and upper lip. I had managed to clear almost all of it up while using this! Stupidly I fell for a video of a different product and switched to it. I just went out and bought this again and already my face feels softer again and I know my hyperpigmentation will decrease again! I won't make that mistake again! This formula does not contain dimethicone which is important to me, I don't want a fake softness to my skin, I want a nourished softness. This is light and silky going on and even with dehydrated, dry skin I can skip a top moisturizer most days. The light smell goes away within seconds and does not bother me at all - strong botanical smells cause a migraine- lucky me! This is not a gel it is more like a serum texture or a light lotion texture, it sinks in pretty quickly. The bottle is glass and beautiful on my countertop, plus pump bottles are way more sanitary than droppers or jars. I appreciate a good pump bottle because I know when something comes with a spatula I'm using my fingers after about a week and a dropper always ends up touching my face or not sucking up enough product so I get mad at it! Come on beauty industry there is nothing wrong with a pump dispenser! Take note!!! I highly recommend this product and pray Lancome doesn't ever discontinue it! 
So if you have uneven tone, hyperpigmentation, dry and or dehydrated skin, aging skin, and dislike dimethicone you may love this formula! * I have been using this product for several years. I began using it during a Summer because it was lightweight, and continued through the year. * I have dry skin and this is a very light moisturizer. So, it's ok during summer, but as soon as it starst getting cold, I needed to double down. I like it's consistency, look and fragrance, but I don't think is worth the price. * I wanted to like it because its lightweight but unfortunately its too light for dry skin.

Name: lipikar eczema soothing relief cream

Name: regenerist micro-sculpting cream
ginzing spf 30 daily moisturizer sunscreen
comments: * Great face lotion with spf. Lotion with spf that does not have a white cast on the skin. I love it and gives a great glow to the face * I received this sunscreen after attending their promotional walk for the launch of the product. I noticed the very next day I started getting micro bumps that resembled milia or granulomatous. I stopped wearing make up and switched to a gentle cleanser to see if those were the reasons however I remained applying the sunscreen to obviously help protect my face. To my surprise, my skin was only getting worse. It was starting to burn and itch. I've been allergy tested, and I don't have any. The day I didn't use the sunscreen, my skin condition immediately disappeared, so I went to look at the ingredients list. I don't know if Origins is using the oils from grapefruit, lemon and orange for fragrance purposes, but it does not list anywhere that they have extracted the furanocoumarins. After meeting with my dermatologist, I was advised that the citrus oils used in the sunscreen caused photosensitivity, and burned/ irritated my skin. If you are someone with darker or sensitive skin, I HIGHLY recommend AVOIDING this.

Name: the mug guard broad spectrum spf 30
comments: * This is the acne friendly spf out there. I workout outside everyday in FL, so finding an SPF that was water and sweat resistant was important. I have tried so many, but thankfully I found this one. I've had so many bad breakouts from SPFs that claimed to be acne safe but this one actually is. * I'm usually a mineral sunscreen girlie because they don't irritate my eyes, I avoided chemical spfs for ages because they'd sting! But this spf doesn't sting at all, infact it's very gentle on my sensitive skin. It applies smoothly, no white cast at all, and sinks in after about 30 or so minutes. It's not greasy but does leave a dewy finish. Not much scent, but there is a subtle "sunscreeny" smell to it. * I was looking for a travel sized set of sunblock to take on vacation in January and stumbled upon Dune.  The fact it was gel was a huge influence and I bought the set.  Its pretty amazing.  It works into the skin nicely and doesnt leave my hands super sticky afterwards like some lotions do.  We ended up using all 3–the Mug Guard (face), Bod Guard (body) and Life Guard (after burn).  I just repurchased this full size Mug Guard (this is kind of a misnomer, as its only 2.2 oz) as its the one I use the most.  As a caveat, depending on what you have on your face, it *can* leave somewhat of a white cast.  Most of the time I'm fine, but there have been occasions where, depending on what moisturizer/serums I use, it does leave a bit of white on there.  Its not enough to make me stop using it, but its good to keep in mind.  Otherwise, I love the way it absorbs and how it feels. * Initially i thought this would work for me. I lived the fact that it was clear and felt it woudl absorb quickly too. However, having a recent health issue, i was disappointed to find Chemical UV Filters listed in the ingredients. My Dr. mentioned these filters mimic estrogen and can wreak havic with your endocrine system. So unfortunately I cannot risk using this lotion. * I was so pleasantly surprised by this sunscreen. I have extremely sensitive skin, acne, rosacea, eczema, you name it. Finding a sunscreen that doesnt cause a reaction felt impossible but alas sunscreen is a necessity. I took a chance on this when it was on sale because of the glowing reviews truthfully not expecting much other than an overpriced basic sunscreen. I am happy to admit I was wrong. I LOVE this sunscreen. It goes on so well, never breaks my skin out with rashes or acne, and reapplies without becoming a mess. I have started using this on my kids too. I came back to order more and leave this review. The bottle is small but it spreads out very well. 10/10 RECOMMEND if your skin cant tolerate most drug store brands. * I bought the Dune Mug Guard on a whim on sale at another store. It's now my holy grail. I had seen so many instagram ads and became curious. I've been wearing it everyday for a month and am so in love with this product. I have very sensitive skin, rosacea, and psoriasis. My skin hasnt looked this good in years, let alone felt this good wearing a sunscreen. It melts in beautifully, gives a lovely glow, and is long lasting. If youre not careful and get it too close to your eye opening, you could experience some burning but that is typical of any American chemical UV filter. After my month of use I think I've only gotten it near my eye twice where it cause a tiny sting and I washed it away quickly. Not a strong enough reason to rate it poorly. I've had other friends try out this sunscreen and they love how it feels and doesn't have that sunscreen smell. * ive been searching and searching for a good spf….and here it is. ive tried it once, today actually, and got several compliment on my skin today! Not an overwhelming itch but enough to recognize I'm having a bad reaction. Peeling, itching and a slight burning sensation. I didn't use makeup the first two days but when I put makeup on the third day, it went on blotchy and I could see the irritation on my cheeks, mostly below my eye area. I'm Pacific Islander, NC30 and in my 40's, sadly this product is not for me. * Product is usually good. But got a bad batch and felt bad so I didn't bring it back.  Cream is old and had been sitting on the shelf for a while.

Name: repairwear laser focus wrinkle correcting eye cream
hello fab coconut water cream
comments: * I recommend this product to EVERYBODY. This stuff right here has completely changed my life. I get compliments on my skin all the time since ive started using this in 2022. I will never stop using it!!! * I have used this product every day, twice a day since 2017. I absolutely love it! It is lightweight, dries down smooth, and helps hydrate my oily sensitive skin. I would cry if FAB ever discontinued this product. 1000% would recommend. * This is a great moisturizer super lightweight better for like oily or skin types. But I like it as a quick little water cream to add to whatever else I'm using for the day. Smells delicious and love coconut so for me, this is a must have! * This product is amazing, it's so light weight and smells amazing. Would definitely recommend * i really loved the product and how it made my skin feel but i went thru the whole thing in one month!!! i can't be buying this every month for that price :/ * If you have acne or just skin in general you NEED this is in your life! * I wanted to love this. The texture is great- very lightweight, dries nicely, and no stickiness, heaviness, dryness, or tightness on my skin after use! Unfortunately, on application, my skin immediately started stinging. I have some rosacea on my cheeks, and this moisturizer made it look and feel awful. The stinging stopped fairly quickly, but the redness persisted. I initially thought it could be from the combination of layering products, but I applied the moisturizer to a clean face with no other product, and it still stung and increased my redness. I have not had this issue with other FAB products- usually they play nicely with my skin type and other products in my routine- so I was very disappointed. If your skin is less sensitive, it might work well for you (again- great texture!), but given that FAB are the "sensitive skin specialists," I have a hard time recommending it.

Name: super restorative day moisturizer
order of the eclipse hyaluronic cream
comments: * I usually use Charlotte Tilbury Magic Cream, but this moisturizer is just as amazing and for a fraction of the price! It's so Moisturizing but doesn't leave you feeling greasy. * This moisturizer is truly amazing! I've been using the Tula moisturizer for a long time but it wasn't working for me anymore so I started trying this one and I have no regrets!! I have combo sensitive skin and I found this product to be so hydrating and it gives a supple look and it looks great under makeup. Definitely recommend trying! * I am absolutely amazed by this cream! As someone with combination/ leaning towards oily skin, this has been one of the best moisturizers I've used in a while. Love that it uses truly clean ingredients. Texture and smell are great, I have no notes. Can be used any time of year! * The reviews fooled me again. I thought this was a lightweight moisturizer. It felt very heavy and greasy on my skin. I will be switching back to the blue Neutrogena moisture and try this out again during the cold and dry months! * Absolutely in love with this moisturizer! This has been the holy grail in helping my sensitive and irritated skin get back on track. I love the feel and the way it sits on the skin after application. I use it only in the evenings for the perfect hydration pick me up. * It goes on well over serums and under sunscreen and makeup. It's the only moisturizer that stays on my face at night abd doesn't transfer to my pillow. Great for night and day. Works for my combo skin. * This is my dream moisturizer as someone with dry-combo skin with large pores. I've always loved the lightweight and bouncy feel of a gel cream, but never got any lasting moisturizing properties. Richer moisturizers did the job, but were both heavy feeling and we're not as satisfying of an application experience (I recognize the latter is totally personal preference, so they wouldn't lose points for that alone). THIS MOISTURIZER, THOUGH? Heaven, nectar, everything I want in a moisturizer including price point. On my days I laze around the house and don't go into the sun, I will wear this without sunscreen and my skin stays moisturized through the entire day. I have bought this over and over again and haven't returned to Korean moisturizers which were my original preference due to the relative affordability and accessibility. BUY THIS OMG

Name: drench & quench cream-to-water hydrator

peptide skinjection moisture infusion cream
comments: * While this did not cause pimples, it caused hives on my face. I missed in the Ingredients that there was both soy and wheat. It took a week for the hives to go away after one use. I couldn't tell what the texture was like over the hives. * I had gotten a sample packet of this cream and I absolutely love how soft and smooth my face is! Looking forward to buying the full size soon:) * Love this new formula!! The price is also great!? * I love how it keeps my dry skin moisturized without drying away minutes after. It's a dense, hydrating formulation, but not so dense that it's too heavy. If you need a moisturizer that's going to help minimize fine lines and retain moisture, This is the one!

Name: moisturizing lotion, hydrating body moisturizer
comments: * The best moisturizer I've tried for my dry, acne-prone skin. It leaves a beautiful glow and feels good on my skin. Not a whole lot to say beyond that. Been using it daily on my arms and legs and have noticed a significant reduction in dryness and irritation. * It naturally smells good, and it is not too harsh on my skin. It is great as a body OR a facial moisturizer, which is just perfect!! * It's really good as a facial moisturizer, especially for young skin. At first, I though this was only a body lotion, but it's really good on my face, too!! It worked super well for my combination skin. Love the pricing, too! * Its good, moisturizes my skin and does its job but the smell is so bad and its really sticky, greasy, and heavy and it takes about an hour or two to absorb * I am a huge fan of Cetaphil. this moisturizer works really well just I would recommend using less than you think you need because it applies really well. * makes my face feel so silky!!

Name: clear collective clarifying prebiotic moisturizer
comments: * I've tried many moisturizers (high end & affordable) for sensitive/acne prone skin and this is by far the best moisturizer, especially for the price! I use this with hyaluronic acid, niacinamide or salicylic acid and it pairs well with all my serums and sunscreen. This is also great under makeup since it's not oily and helps makeup last longer. I've repurchased this moisturizer at least 4 times and I always have a backup! * I love that this moisturizer is buildable. You xan relaly control how much you need. It feels great on my skin and my skin is noticeably more plump. I love it! * I am acne-prone but need a moisturizer for skin dryness, especially during the winter when the cold wind easily dries out your skin. After using this moisturizer, I have had several instances of bad luck with getting a new pimple the next morning. The texture and application (no burning) of this product are fine. It does its job to moisturize the skin. However, not without suffering more blemishes sadly. I picked this while trying to find noncomedogenic moisturizers with clean ingredients according to Yuka, but my mom helped point out to me later this has vegetable oil in it… Cool! 🙃 * its just perfect and a little goes a long way * I dont really know what people are saying about this product, most people are saying its lightweight and non greasy but it feels so heavy, sticky, and greasy on my face, maybe just not for me but I won't be buying this again * I have sensitive skin and this works well for me. Love that it isnt too heavy on my combo/acne prone skin * I was hoping this product would work well on my acne-prone skin, but it doesn't seem to do much for me. It doesn't absorb very well into the skin so the more you use the more ends up sitting on your face. The claims about this moisturizer being pre-biotic don't seem to mean much. Hero specializes in products for acne and acne-prone skin, so I assumed this moisturizer would work well in my routine and be hydrating but I was disappointed.

Name: green apple age defy moisturizer
supermello hyaluronic gel cream
comments: * My skin burns from water, I swear. I am incredibly sensitive to everything. My skin chaps, get red and raw, itches and burns. I have tried most of the major 'sensitive' skin moisturizers high to low end, and this is the absolute winner. Keeps my skin moisturized and smells great. I have found it does not do well under makeup so I only use at night and for the first time, thats enough moisture for me. * I've been using this moisturizer for a few years now and I LOVE it! This is the only lotion I've found that leaves me with no irritation or redness. Highly recommend! * I've gone through a couple jars of this moisturizer - it's incredibly rare to find one that truly doesn't clog my pores, and despite some highly comedogenic ingredients, this one surprisingly does not break me out at all. Also makes my skin incredibly soft. Unfortunately, however, as I continued to use this, noticed my pores becoming increasingly large and more noticeable, and my skin texture getting worse and worse. Stopped using for a few weeks (keeping everything else in my routine the same) and my  texture is looking quite a bit better. So, no go for me. * Wow just wow. I am on my second container of this and from a girl with sensitive skin i cant say enough good things! * I have been using this moisturizer for about 14 months now. The changes to my skin health have blown me away. I have very sensitive skin and have been diagnosed with psorasis on my face and scalp, rosacea, and facial keratosis. I have invested so much money in dermatologist recommended skincare products but everything I tried aggravated my skin and worsened my psoriasis or rosacea. This is one of the only products my skin hasn't reacted to and was what convinced me to try other kinship products. I can't make any promises about what results you will get from this product since everyone's skin is different but I would suggest trying this if you are dealing with sensitive skin or psoriasis. It has a lightweight texture and a faint vanilla scent that dissapated soon after application. I really appreciate that kinship only uses plant extracts to scent there products instead of essential oils or fragrance, which are much stronger and very irritating to sensitive skin. I  also like that instead of having numerous of actives in one product, this just has hyaluronic acid and a stable vitamin c ester, THDA, that if safe for sensitive skin and addresses hyperpigmentation. Since using this product for over a year, I've had so much less skin irritation, my hyperpigmentation has noticably improved, and I have a smoother skin texture with less keratosis bumps. This moisturizer has outperformed ones that are 3 times the price. The 3.5 oz size is a great value considering a little goes a long way with this product. I have switched to using almost excusively kinship products and having tried almost all their products at this point. This is definately in the top 3 along along with the spf 32 and the papya cleanser. I've noticed that kinship products regularly go on sale every couple months on ulta. I would suggest waiting for a sale to grap a couple of their products if the prices are a little outside your budget like they are for mine. * I have been using this moisturizer for about 14 months now. Name: seabiotic water cream
comments:

Name: daily corrector spf 35 face moisturizer
comments: * this sunscreen gave me such a healthy glove, and my skin did not feel oily or greasy at!!!! I used to have the Laroche poosay (I hope i spelled it right) sunscreen, and it would make my skin shiny, but it all oily. I have normal skin and I really love this product. * I'm in my 30's and have always had acne prone, oily skin. A few years ago, I was able to clear up my skin with a strict morning and night routine that includes prescription creams, but every time I would try using SPF, I would immediately break out. I've tried dozens of prestige and drugstore brands! This moisturizer with SPF is the first that hasnt caused a single breakout. I've been using it for over a month now and I will continue to as long as its on shelves. * This product is okay as a moisturizer and sunscreen but leaves you shiny looking. For the price, theres way better sunscreens out there. The murad sunscreen in a blue bottle is about the same size and the same price but works amazing. * I switched to this sunscreen and my pores and oily skin were controlled also my skin felt amazing! I could t rebuy it because I was pregnant but whenever I get my hands on this again I would gladly stick to this only. The only con is the size and price * I wanted this to work for me but it kept making me break out after a week of use. Every day I had new pimples showing up. Other than that, I like everything else about it. It absorbs well and is easy to apply. It doesn't leave a white cast or smell like sunscreen. My face felt moisturized throughout the day and the SPF is good. Just wish it didn't cause acne! * This is the first product with sunscreen that doesn't break out my sensitive skin. Really like how is makes my skin glow after application. This was recommended at the store and I'm SO in love with it! The texture is perfect and it keeps me matte throughout the day. And the SPF is a huge bonus!

Name: cloud cream gel-to-water hydrating essence moisturizer
comments:
* I mean it...when I say I am nearly 30 and struggled with hormonal skin since I was 12..I have spent SO much money on skincare products, it's insane. Recently I bought a $150 moisturizer claiming it was magic, when THIS..PUR Cloud Cream (for a fraction of the price)..was all I've ever wanted and needed. It is the silkiest product and it just melts into the skin like a drink for your pores. I mix it with a dab of Charlotte Tilbury "beautiful skin" foundation and I feel like a million bucks. Immediate confidence boost. It's just enough tint to perfect the redness from my acne and scars...and it leaves the most gorgeous finish, like I just got back from the medspa and my skin is plump, hydrated, and GLOWING. I got this as a sample from Ulta and I had to come back here, buy the full size immediately, and leave a review. I knew nothing about it so when I searched it up I was expecting this to be much more expensive. A double win for it's attainable price!! Please never discontinue. * I am allergic to tocopherol acetate, and this is the only moisturizer I can find at Ulta without it. Thank goodness it works well. Feels nice, not greasy. Absorbs quickly, and isnt strong smelling. * This is one of the only things I can use on my face! I dont have to worry about my face sweating when
I wear it. It is lightweight and is scent free! * Okay so. I have extremely finicky, super sensitiveGr, combination skin. Ive tried lots of moisturizer brands such as Clarins, CosRx, Drunk Elephant, and Beauty Counter. As great as they worked, my skin sucked up the creams too fast and didnt last me throughout the whole day. Serums helped, but would cause me to break out in consistent trouble spots. The way it sat on my skin did NOT feel even. Rough versus smooth. And when using foundation, you could see the different textures. 

Since using Pür Cloud Cream, I can honestly say this is one of the most amazing products Ive ever tried?? 
When applying, a little is a lot. It smoothes out so evenly, feels cold and refreshing right off the bat. I let it sit about a minute or two, did a test feel of my skin. Let me tell you, the texture was IMMEDIATELY consistent over my whole face. Trouble areas such as the nose, above my lips, smile lines, and eyebrows were rich and hydrated. Im actually kind of shook how quickly, too.

When using foundation, it gave an airbrushed feel and look. My skin still felt smooth! And was definitely still hydrated. 

So excited for trying this product. Will DEFINITELY buy it again. * Lightweight and goes on smooth * Love this for my acne prone skin, it soaks right in and leaves my skin feeling so soft and hydrated. Not oily and clogged at all like some moisturizers. * All of the PUR products have been really nice for my dry, sensitive skin. These have become holy grail products for me over the last year.

Name: poreless oil-free moisturizer
comments: * It's so light and makes skin smooth totally recommended especially acne prone skin like mine. * I love the way it feels on my skin. Great product! * Truly oil free. I have oily skin so I can immediately pick up on oily products. Very light weight and good texture. Best I've used so far. * Great product * I had started using the Bareminerals Skin Longevity line but didn't quite care for the daily moisturizer with sunscreen so I bought this product.  I am 60 yoa and have struggled with acne and skin problems since I was a teenager.  I believe it's mostly due to bad genes because my sisters and daughter also had acne problems. This moisturizer absorbs well, but because it is oil free, it doesn't leave my skin shiny or greasy looking. It makes my skin feel fresh and smooth. I do not look my age and I believe that using these Baremineral products contribute to my better looking skin. * I use this daily after cleansing. It is light-weight but easily covers my face & neck. It isn't oily at all. I have used other products in the past. They cause breakouts and leave my face feeling greasy all day or soak in immediately & don't create a good foundation. * Best moisture I have ever used. A little goes a long ways.  My skin has never felt or looked this good. Absolutely love this product.  Please don't ever stop selling this.

Name: absolue revitalizing & brightening rich cream
comments: * When I started using the Absolute Cream Rich along with the Serum, and the eye cream plus the cleaning my face with the Absolute Oil-In-Gel Cleanser every day my face felt so different! I noticed how smooth, how easy to smile it was, and what a big difference it was from the previous years. Using the whole set it's very expensive but if you are careful and use them as indicated they last.  I bought mine on October 2022 and run out of them in February 2023 bravo!!!  And that was because I had to travel to different countries so I ended taking small amounts in my containers when I when to Europe. Then on my way back I travel to Mexico so I took all the bottles because I was going to stay there 3 months. Then my set got finished there   I checked in the fine stores in Mexico but there were no Refills so I had to I'm wait till I return to USA to buy them. I'm strongly recommending the Lancôme Absolute products they all wonderful! Use them carefully and daily! * I love this product, and I've tried quite a few high end moisturizers. I'm 52 a post menopausal. I only gave it 4* because of the price, and the fragrance.  Most over the age of 50 will likely remember a bottle of White Shoulders sitting on their grandmother or mother's vanity, and that's what the smell of this cream reminds me of. Very floral and not just roses. I can live with the price, but I would definitely give it 5* if Lancôme would make a fragrance free version. The fragrance doesn't linger, but the smell reminds me of what old women smelled like when I was a child.

Name: lift & luminate triple action day cream spf 30
